ControlledList.ListName: Fire and Rescue Statistics - Incident Type List

Metadata.Creator: Fire and Rescue Statistics Division, HM Government
Metadata.Description: Fire and Rescue Statistics - Incident Recording System (IRS) Taxonomy/Hierarch File for Mobilisation Incident Types
Metadata.Subject.Project: Fire and Rescue Statistics - Incident Recording System
Metadata.Title: Fire and Rescue Statistics - Incident Recording System Taxonomy/Hierarch File for Mobilisation Incident Types

Item.Name: Incident Type
Item.ScopeNotes: Base item for all incident types

Item.Name: AFA
Item.ScopeNotes: Fire alarms

Item.Name: Gas alarms
Item.ScopeNotes: Carbon Monoxide, Methane, Ammonia, Chlorine

Item.Name: Smoke alarm
Item.ScopeNotes: Domestic Smoke Alarm

Item.Name: Explosion
Item.ScopeNotes: Explosion domestic, Explosion Industry

Item.Name: Vehicle LPG fuelled
Item.ScopeNotes: Bus LPG, Car LPG, Van LPG, etc.

Item.Name: Aircraft large
Item.ScopeNotes: Aircraft fire, large

Item.Name: Aircraft light
Item.ScopeNotes: Aircraft fire small, helicopter

Item.Name: Boat
Item.ScopeNotes: Barge, Boat, Rowing boat, Yacht

Item.Name: Building
Item.ScopeNotes: Includes 'water on electrics in a domestic property' (because 'Fire - Electrical installations states 'non-domestic'.')

Item.Name: Caravan / camping
Item.ScopeNotes: E.g. where on a campsite or at a music festival where other structures/tents may become involved

Item.Name: Electrical installations
Item.ScopeNotes: Cable, Cable arcing, electric box, High Voltage Cable, junction box, overhead power lines, pylons, water affecting electrics, transformer, sub station

Item.Name: Fire
Item.ScopeNotes: Unknown, unknown fire. Includes 'unidentified smell of burning'

Item.Name: Fire in the open - large
Item.ScopeNotes: Hay stack, bales of hay / straw, standing crop, corn field, forest fire, heath, moor, peat land, plantation, woods

Item.Name: Fire in the open - small
Item.ScopeNotes: Bush, tree, hedge, fence, allotment, back yard, grass, garden fire, gorse, bonfire, common, Copse, embankment, field, grass, jetty, manure, pallets, paper bank, park, park/playground equip, playground, recycling bank, recycling container, refuse, rubbish, rubbish bin, rubbish skip, shrubs, straw, stubble, waste, wasteland, wheelie bin, tent (where e.g. a tent in a field), tip, undergrowth

Item.Name: Persons
Item.ScopeNotes: Persons reported

Item.Name: Railway train goods
Item.ScopeNotes: Goods train fire, wagon, train, tanker, locomotive

Item.Name: Road furniture
Item.ScopeNotes: Lamp post, street lamp, telegraph pole, telephone kiosk, bollards, traffic lights, speed camera, road sign, etc

Item.Name: Ship
Item.ScopeNotes: Fire at sea, in harbour, ship canal, berthed

Item.Name: Smoke in the open
Item.ScopeNotes: Pall of smoke, smoke in area, smoke in distance

Item.Name: Vehicle large
Item.ScopeNotes: Bus, lorry, coach, combine harvester, HGV, road tanker non hazardous, tractor, tram, agricultural vehicles

Item.Name: Vehicle small
Item.ScopeNotes: Car, van, cycle, derelict car, light road vehicle, moped, motorbike, motorcycle

Item.Name: Advice given
Item.ScopeNotes: Please ignore this option for IRS recording purposes as incidents NOT attended are not recordable on the IRS

Item.Name: Aircraft landing
Item.ScopeNotes: Patients by air, helicopter landing

Item.Name: Assist other agency
Item.ScopeNotes: Environment agency, RSPCA, Police, Ambulance etc., body recovery, obese person requires assistance, disabled person requires assistance, person collapsed, person electrocuted, supply water

Item.Name: Boat stability
Item.ScopeNotes: Barge, boat sinking

Item.Name: Dangerous structure
Item.ScopeNotes: Aerial in dangerous condition, chimney in danger of collapse, gable end in danger of collapse, hoardings, kite on overhead power line, tiles / slates falling from roof, storm, storm damage, tree in dangerous condition

Item.Name: Fire safety issue
Item.ScopeNotes: Locked exits, fire safety queries

Item.Name: Flooding
Item.ScopeNotes: Flood, flooding weather related, burst water main

Item.Name: Inform other agency
Item.ScopeNotes: Medical help required, burst water main, burglar alarm, environmental issues, personal burns, RSPCA

Item.Name: Persons locked out
Item.ScopeNotes: Lock out

Item.Name: RTC
Item.ScopeNotes: RTC make vehicles safe, RTC no persons, includes pedal bike incidents

Item.Name: Supply water
Item.ScopeNotes: Filling swimming pools, tank filling, provision of water for livestock

Item.Name: Swill away
Item.ScopeNotes: Fuel spillage, wash down, wash away, wash down of blood

Item.Name: Gas involved
Item.ScopeNotes: Gas leak

Item.Name: Haz mat minor
Item.ScopeNotes: Low hazard spillage, low risk substance, refrigerant leak domestic

Item.Name: Pipeline
Item.ScopeNotes: Ethylene pipeline, kerosene pipeline, gas pipeline, hexaflow, petroleum

Item.Name: Radiation involved
Item.ScopeNotes: Nuclear

Item.Name: Unidentified smell
Item.ScopeNotes: Unusual/unidentifiable smell, noxious (curry) odours

Item.Name: Vehicle leaking fuel
Item.ScopeNotes: Car leaking petrol, Car leaking diesel

Item.Name: Haz mat major
Item.ScopeNotes: Asbestos, Bio Hazard, chemical incident, dangerous substance, Haz Sub, Haz Sub Beach, Haz Sub Tanker, High Risk Substance, Large spillage Diesel/Petrol, Large spillage on garage forecourt, Leaking cylinder, oil pollution, oil spillage, oil tanks on fire, unidentified containers, road tanker (hazardous)

Item.Name: Haz mat sub shoreline
Item.ScopeNotes: Containers, drums, spillages washed up on the shoreline, etc.

Item.Name: Aircraft accident large
Item.ScopeNotes: Aircraft rescue large, Aircraft passenger

Item.Name: Aircraft accident light
Item.ScopeNotes: Air Accident Crop, Aircraft Accident light, Hazmat involved, Glider crashed, Helicopter crash, Hot Air Balloon, Microlite

Item.Name: Aircraft in distress
Item.ScopeNotes: Impending crash

Item.Name: Animal rescue large
Item.ScopeNotes: Animal trapped, Cow trapped, Horse in ditch, Horse trapped, Horse/Cow, Large animal trapped

Item.Name: Animal rescue small
Item.ScopeNotes: Animal rescue, Animal rescue small, Bird stuck up a tree, Cat stuck up a tree, Dog trapped, Swan rescue

Item.Name: Boat rescue
Item.ScopeNotes: Barge

Item.Name: Building collapse
Item.ScopeNotes: Collapsed building

Item.Name: Evacuation of persons
Item.ScopeNotes: Evacuation of homes

Item.Name: Lift persons shut in
Item.ScopeNotes: Person stuck in lift

Item.Name: Persons trapped
Item.ScopeNotes: Child fallen or stuck, lift rescue machinery, lift trapped, person chained, person impaled

Item.Name: Railway accident
Item.ScopeNotes: Metro detrainment above, Metro detrainment below, train crash, train crash/derailed above, train derailment

Item.Name: Rescue from confined space
Item.ScopeNotes: cave, mine, sewer, silo, grain dryer, underground, trench/pit, pothole rescue

Item.Name: Rescue from entrapment
Item.ScopeNotes: Ball and chain, Lift rescue machinery, lift trapped, Person chained, Person impaled, person trapped, person trapped in machinery, removal of object, removal of jewellery, removal of ring from finger, scaffolding collapse

Item.Name: Rescue from entrapment (non-emergency)
Item.ScopeNotes: Ball and chain, Person chained, removal of object, removal of jewellery, removal of ring from finger, ring removal, ring stuck on finger, person stuck/trapped in bath

Item.Name: Rescue from height
Item.ScopeNotes: Cliff rescue, cliff climbing incident, Crane, High-rise Rescue, line rescue, walkway rescue, Person precarious location, person stuck/trapped in cliff or crag, person stuck/trapped mast/tower, person stuck/trapped scaffolding/steelwork, Person trapped in crane, Quarry, roof rescue

Item.Name: Rescue from mud
Item.ScopeNotes: Quicksand - Sand rescue

Item.Name: Rescue from water
Item.ScopeNotes: Rescue from ice, lakes, running water, the sea, canals, reservoirs, piers

Item.Name: RTC persons trapped (large vehicles)
Item.ScopeNotes: RTC Bus, RTC Coach, RTC Coach Crash, RTC HGV incident, RTC Lorry persons trapped, Tram

Item.Name: Ship sinking
Item.ScopeNotes: At sea, in harbour, ship canal, berthed.

Item.Name: Suicide attempt
Item.ScopeNotes: Person threatening to jump from height. Persons threatening to burn themselves or other self harm

Item.Name: Bomb suspected
Item.ScopeNotes: Bomb threat

Item.Name: Civil disturbance
Item.ScopeNotes: Civil disorder, disturbance likely to escalate

Item.Name: Call challenged pp - public pay phone
Item.ScopeNotes: For IRS use this category only if the FRS challenged the call but still made an attendance at the supposed scene

Item.Name: Call challenged mp - mobile phone
Item.ScopeNotes: For IRS use this category only if the FRS challenged the call but still made an attendance at the supposed scene

Item.Name: Call challenged ps - public subscriber line
Item.ScopeNotes: For IRS use this category only if the FRS challenged the call but still made an attendance at the supposed scene

Item.Name: Not Known
Item.ScopeNotes: A command and control system can't identify a code as it only possesses a Description.
